dcterms:creator: Himan Abdollahpouri
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates the impact of popularity bias in ranking and recommendation systems, focusing on how it affects user choices and welfare.
dcterms:title: Popularity Bias in Recommendation

dcterms:creator: Himan Abdollahpouri
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a multi-stakeholder perspective on popularity bias in recommendation systems, analyzing its implications for different stakeholders.
dcterms:title: Popularity Bias in Recommendation: A Multi-Stakeholder Perspective

dcterms:creator: Himan Abdollahpouri
Masoud Mansoury
dcterms:description: This dataset explores multi-sided exposure bias in recommendation systems, focusing on how exposure affects user choices and item popularity.
dcterms:title: Multi-Sided Exposure Bias in Recommendation

dcterms:creator: Himan Abdollahpouri
Robin Burke
Bamshad Mobasher
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on controlling popularity bias in learning-to-rank recommendation systems, providing insights into mitigating its effects.
dcterms:title: Controlling Popularity Bias in Learning-to-Rank Recommendation

dcterms:creator: Himan Abdollahpouri
Masoud Mansoury
Robin Burke
Bamshad Mobasher
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the unfairness of popularity bias in recommendation systems, analyzing its impact on user experience and fairness.
dcterms:title: The Unfairness of Popularity Bias in Recommendation

dcterms:creator: Himan Abdollahpouri
Masoud Mansoury
Robin Burke
Bamshad Mobasher
Edward Malthouse
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a user-centered evaluation of popularity bias in recommender systems, focusing on user experiences and perceptions.
dcterms:title: User-Centered Evaluation of Popularity Bias in Recommender Systems

dcterms:creator: Ming He
Changshu Li
Xinlei Hu
Xin Chen
Jiwen Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on mitigating popularity bias in recommendation systems through counterfactual inference, providing a novel approach to address bias.
dcterms:title: Mitigating Popularity Bias in Recommendation via Counterfactual Inference
